boise.neighborhoods: Downtown, North End, East End, Bench, Boise State area
boise.meetingHighlights: Large and active fellowship with meetings across downtown and the North End; strong newcomer programs and speaker meetings.
boise.transitInfo: ValleyRide buses serve Boise and surrounding areas; Boise Airport (BOI) provides regional flights.

nampa.neighborhoods: Downtown Nampa, Lakevue, Karcher, West Nampa
nampa.meetingHighlights: Community-focused meetings with active evening groups and outreach to nearby smaller towns.
nampa.transitInfo: ValleyRide and regional bus routes; easy highway access to Boise and regional airports.

meridian.neighborhoods: Downtown Meridian, West Boise, Lake Hazel, Cherry Lane
meridian.meetingHighlights: Rapidly growing suburban meetings with many family-friendly and weekday groups; strong newcomer support.
meridian.transitInfo: Regional bus service connects Meridian to Boise; airport access via Boise (BOI).

idaho-falls.meetingHighlights: Small-city meetings with steady attendance and collaborative events with neighboring towns.
idaho-falls.transitInfo: LOCAL bus services and regional highways; Idaho Falls Regional Airport (IDA) provides regional connections.

coeur-dalene.neighborhoods: Downtown, Tubbs Hill, Hayden Lake (nearby), Worley
coeur-dalene.meetingHighlights: Active lakeside meetings with a mix of seasonal visitors and local groups; several area retreats and speaker meetings.
coeur-dalene.transitInfo: Local bus services and regional highways; Spokane International Airport (GEG) and Coeur d'Alene airport for regional access.
